text: Josephus Albertus "Jos" Vandeloo (Zonhoven, 5 September 1925 - 5 October 2015) was a Belgian writer and poet. His career began in the 1950s. He became well known with the stories De muur (E: The wall) en Het gevaar (E: The danger). ==Other websites== * Jos Vandeloo * Jos Vandeloo * G.J. van Bork en P.J. Verkruijsse, De Nederlandse en Vlaamse auteurs (1985) Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian novelists Category:Belgian poets Category:People from Limburg (Belgium)
title: Jos Vandeloo
